# Commands used to scaffold and generate docs

# Scaffold (manual files due to missing Node locally)
# npx create-docusaurus@latest docs-site classic --typescript --package-manager npm

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Generate API docs from source
pip install -e ..
python3 scripts/gen_api_docs.py

# Local dev
npm run start

# Build
npm run build

# Versioning
npm run docusaurus -- docs:version 0.1.8
